About Scalar ONLINE

Join us for the first fully online, all-day all-timezone Scala conference!

15 May 2020, at your home.

As we’ve joined stayinghomeclub and Scalar 2020 has been postponed to 8-10th of October 2020, we’re taking Scalar online to meet with all of you in spring.

Scalar ONLINE will be fully online, all-day all-timezone Scala conference with 45min presentations, Q&A sessions and networking opportunities. Let’s meet, learn and celebrate Functional Programming!

SCALAR ONLINE IN SHORT
ONLINE

Stay up to date, learn new skills and exchange FP knowledge while staying home.

Global

Enjoy all-day filled with presentations, Q&As and networking sessions.

More than 30 speakers

Talk to world-class experts in Functional Programming.

Community

Meet other FP enthusiasts from all over the world.
